summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Glow Beauty Studio salon storefront. All major functionality working correctly including public pages, admin dashboard, mobile responsiveness, and WhatsApp integration.

minor_issues.issue: Returns HTTP 200 instead of 201 for successful creation
minor_issues.impact: Minor API design inconsistency, but functionality works correctly

passed_tests: All public API endpoints (salon, services, gallery, reviews, offers, home-data)
All CRUD operations for services, gallery, reviews, offers
Home page loading with hero, offers, services, and reviews sections
Services page displaying grouped services by category with prices and duration
Gallery page with image filtering by tags
Book page with complete booking form and WhatsApp integration
Policies/FAQ page with accordion-style FAQ functionality
Admin CRUD interfaces for all models (services, gallery, reviews, offers)
Mobile bottom bar with WhatsApp, Call, and Directions buttons
Navigation between all pages working correctly

success_percentage.backend: 95% (19/20 tests passed - minor status code issue)
